release_note: Disappearing Messages now has two modes Disappear after Send and Disappear After Read When Disappear after Send is selected messages will disappear from sender recipient and network simultaneously a set time after they have been sent regardless of whether the recipient has received or read the message. When Disappear after Read is selected messages will disappear for the sender and the sender s swarm a set time after they have been sent and for the recipient and the recipient s swarm a set time after they have been read. Messages which haven t been read after 14 days will disappear for the recipient and their swarm. Both options will be available in 1 1 chats but only Disappear after Send will be available in Groups. Neither will be available in Communities. This release includes the new version of Disappearing Messages however the feature won t be enabled until March 13th 10am AEDT this will give users time to update their clients to be able to interpret the new type of messages

Fixed a rare issue which could cause mentions to stop working Fixed an issue jumping to quoted messages Fixed an issue where links in certain message types could not be tapped Fixed a bug where the Push Notification permission dialog might not appear during onboarding Fixed a couple of UI bugs with the emoji list Updated the in conversation search to prioritise currently visible results Added a few error modals for errors which could occur when sending attachments

Fixed a crash when rapidly scrolling messages Fixed a crash on the blocked contacts screen Fixed some crashes when interacting with media Fixed some minor copy and theming issues Removed broken TURN servers to fix calls
Fix an issue where the blocked contact list wouldn t include some blocked contacts under certain circumstances Fix an issue where an invalid account could be created under certain circumstances

Fixed an issue where updating from an old version to the latest version could result in a database error on launch Fixed a couple of issues preventing Link Previews from loading correctly Fixed an issue which could cause the conversation screen from incorrectly being dismissed Updated translations

Fixed an issue where the Share Extension could fail due to specific network conditions Fixed a number of issues with Push Notifications Fixed a number of minor UI UX issues Removed some non functional controls from the device settings

Updated Push Notifications to be faster and more reliable Added a setting to control whether you receive message requests from community conversations Fixed a bug where outgoing messages could appear duplicated temporarily Fixed a bug where outgoing messages might not show the Failed state in some cases Fixed a bug where communities might stop receiving messages until restarting the app Fixed a rare crash when accessing the Seed via the home screen prompt Fixed a rare crash when trying to send a message Fixed a crash when entering a recovery phrase with a word that contained less than 3 characters Fixed a crash when selecting an out of bounds image in the attachments screen
Fixed a crash with the QRCode scanner Fixed a crash when trying to take a video attachment
Improved syncing across multiple devices making it more reliable and efficient Adds support for syncing conversation read state between devices Many bug fixes and optimisations

Added the ability to remove the Display Picture Fixed an issue preventing Link Previews from working Fixed an issue which could cause global search to hang indefinitely Fixed a few crashes Made a few minor performance improvements

Fixed an issue preventing the share extension from working Fixed an issue preventing the mentions list from appearing Fixed an issue where the outgoing message state could appear incorrect on the home screen

Added the ability to swap between video views during calls Added the ability to view additional info for media messages Slight performance improvements for the Home and Conversation screens Fixed an issue preventing users from sending one to one messages in some cases Fixed an issue resulting in attachments being uploaded multiple times Fixed an issue where if enabled typing indicators could get sent incorrectly in some cases Fixed a few minor UI issues
Improved the conversation swipe behaviours Improved the process of leaving groups Fixed an issue where attachments could be uploaded multiple times Fixed a crash when joining certain communities
Fixed an issue where links weren t tappable

Fixes: Fixed an issue where mentions weren t working in groups. Fixed an issue where the voice recording could break the input view. Fixed an issue where the app would attempt to register for push notifications on launch even before onboarding. Fix quoting in community chats. Fix read receipts and message read state. Improvements: Update the Share to Session view to always show Note to Self first. Updated the Path view to indicate the network reachability. Updated messages sent to Note to Self to properly indicate whether they were sent to the network. Optimised sync messages sent to linked devices. Added a warning prompt the first time someone uses Giphy.

Fixed an issue where uploading files can be failed Fixed an issue where registering to push notification server will be failed Fixed an issue where a user couldn t delete their own messages sent from a linked device to a community

Updated the path status to better reflect network connection status Fixed some issues with read receipts and the delivery status UI Fixed an issue where URLs in messages might not work correctly Fixed an issue where the app didn t require a passcode to be set to use screen lock Fixed an issue where a user couldn t delete their own messages sent to a community

Happy New Year to all Session iOS users! This first build of Session in 2023 includes: Fix open group messages trimming. Fix user name disappears when linking a new device. Fix a crash when entering long mnemonic phrases to recover an account. Increase the file upload size to 10MB. Use service node offset time where possible. Add the updated delivery status UI. Update the create closed group screen to cancel the search field when tapping outside of it previously required tapping the cancel button . Fix a bunch of issues related to job running and optimise message sending receiving experience.
Fixed an issue where message attachments could incorrectly be uploaded multiple times Fixed an issue where animated avatars would be converted to static images
Fixed a crash which could occur in global search Fixed a bug where copying the open group url wasn t working correctly Improve UI for quoted messages Added basic UI support for iPad landscape mode
Fixed an issue where users would randomly be unable to send messages Fixed an issue which could prevent Communities from working properly Fixed a few minor UI issues
Fixed an issue where app settings didn t appear to work Fixed a few crashes

Improvements: Added theming Updated the conversation creation and main app settings Added the ability to locally delete info messages Crash Fixes: Fixed a crash when receiving a message which contained a mention followed by a link Fixed a couple of crashes due to under the hood processing Bug Fixes: Fixed a few issues with disappearing messages conversation not updating messages not disappearing immediately Fixed an issue where user data wouldn t get synced between devices correctly Fixed a few layout issues with the message long press menu Fixed a few issues with searching Fixed a few issues where the messages UI wouldn t update correctly in some cases

Improvements: Added documents section in the all media screen for a conversation Added the ability to either block or delete message requests Updated the UI for media messages Fixes: Fixed a number of bugs with calls Fixed some issues with how disappearing messages were behaving Fixed the None notification sound setting Fixed a few minor Emoji Reacts bugs Fixed an issue where users could appear twice in the open group mention list Fixed some issues when the app was in the background

New Features: Emoji reacts. Fixes: Fixed a bug where notifications could incorrectly appear for messages in the current thread. Fixed a bug where swiping left right on images could load images from other threads. Fixed a bug where the unread count wouldn t appear correctly when opening a conversation. Fixed a bug where the unread count on the conversation cell could get truncated. Fixed a bug where notifications weren t working correctly when the app is in the foreground. Fixed a bug where we weren t clearing the received X new messages count when in the foreground. Fixed a bug where outgoing messages could get marked as read in a very specific case. Fixed crashes. Improvements: Added a placeholder person icon when you have a closed group with a single member. Updated the group notification logic to only and always apply to Open Groups. Optimised database performance.

We have rebuilt the app database in order to improve performance and general user experience when using the app Added support for ID Blinding within Open Groups to help protect users Made a number of minor bug fixes Fixes: Fixed a bug where outgoing messages on the senders device wouldn t be removed based on the disappearing messages setting Fixed an issue where open group rooms could stop retrieving messages in certain circumstances Fixed an issue where the unread count was calculated incorrectly in certain cases Fixed an issue where open group mods admins might not have been able to perform mod admin functionality in some situations Fixed a broken migration issue

We have rebuilt the app database in order to improve performance and general user experience when using the app Added support for ID Blinding within Open Groups to help protect users Made a number of minor bug fixes Fixes: Fixed a bug where outgoing messages on the senders device wouldn t be removed based on the disappearing messages setting Fixed an issue where open group rooms could stop retrieving messages in certain circumstances Fixed an issue where the unread count was calculated incorrectly in certain cases Fixed an issue where open group mods admins might not have been able to perform mod admin functionality in some situations

We have rebuilt the app database in order to improve performance and general user experience when using the app Added support for ID Blinding within Open Groups to help protect users Made a number of minor bug fixes Fixes: Fixed a bug where outgoing messages on the senders device wouldn t be removed based on the disappearing messages setting

We have rebuilt the app database in order to improve performance and general user experience when using the app Added support for ID Blinding within Open Groups to help protect users Made a number of minor bug fixes
Fixes: Fix an issue where closed group can stop polling.

Fixes: Fix typing indicator. Fix one missed call may result in multiple info messages and notifications. Fix an issue where input field may disappear. Improvements: Selected photos can be updated in app. In conversation search results is highlighted with shadow. Prevent old messages from coming back.

We have made significant change to support the upcoming hardfork in this version So we highly recommend all Session users to update. New Features: Prepare for hard fork. Fixes: Fix rejected message requests can come back on linked devices. Fix closed groups can stop updating sometimes. Fix new addition to closed groups can be seen in the mention list. Fix some colours may go wrong when changing the app theme. Fix weird margin of conversation titles. Fix message input box becomes not scrollable after losing focus in some circumstances. Improvements: Update translations.

New Features: P2P voice and video call! Fixes: Fixed system CallKit UI might result in an endless loop. Fixed system CallKit won t get connected sometimes in locked screen. Fixed an issue when going back to pick more images the first image is not selected. Fixed a crash in background. Improvements: Added notification for missed calls. Added an info icon and a popup for calls that are missed because of permission denied.

Fixes: Fixed a crash when approving message requests. Fixed a crash when entering links or email address. Fixed a bug where sharing a url with LinkPreviews disabled could result in it being duplicated in the message. Improvements: Further performance improvements.

Fixes: Fixed fast mode push notification. Fixed a random crash during onion routing path building. Fixed messages with 2 links a link preview clicking on both links will show the same link of the link preview. Improvements: Contacts blocked state can be synced across devices now. Further performance improvements. UI UX improvements.

New Features: Allow previewing PDF Microsoft Word Excel Powerpoint previews attachments within the app. Message Request: Messages you receive from unknown users or contacts will be filtered into a message requests folder. Fixes: Fixed a bug where sharing a text file was resulting in the entire contents being put into the message input field. Fixed a bug where sharing from within the app where the app was in dark mode but the device was in light mode would result in buggy UI. Fixed a bug where open group joined on a linked device won t show on Session iOS. Improvements: Menu buttons now come with text description now. Swiping to reply has a lower threshold now. General performance improvements. Use up to two scaled placeholder characters for users with no avatar.

New Features: Global Search. Fixes: Conversation screen will make sure to scroll to bottom when all messages are read. Read More button colour is now the same as text. Improvements: Path indicator is moved. Current routing can be checked through the entrance in Settings. Home screen title UI is upgraded. Image rotation works counter clockwise as the icon indicates. Unread number will show 4 digits rather than 2. Outgoing message text is grey in light mode now for better visualisation. Media message display is improved to show a better ratio for thumbnails. Improve the UX of sharing to Session.

New Features: Allow images to be directly pasted into the app from clipboard. Fixes: Fix duplicated disappearing message info in closed group. Fix text with doc type attachments won t show in the message bubble. Video player view now has a progress bar shown properly. Disable typing indicators and read receipts by default. Improvements: Profile Picture has higher definition 640 640 . Temporarily prevent display of Session ID s in open groups. Setting nickname to Anonymous person works now.

New Features: Pinning conversations. Fixes: Fix a crash when removing members from closed groups. Fix a photo orientation issue. Fix crazy notification in a background polling. Fix dark text on dark background issue. Improvements: Keep screen on when recording audio messages.

New Features: Appearance based on system theme. Delete message both locally and remotely. Now you can recall a message be deleting the message for everyone in chats and that message will also be removed from the network which means it won t come back by restoring the account. Fixes: Fix notifications with no preview show APN_message . Fix disappearing message doesn t work for new chats. Improvements: Change Support to Debug Log . Split the image attachments from the text in message bubble. Remote notification will follow the sound settings

Fixes: Fix iOS 15 status bar UI issue. Fix notifications are fired with 5s delay when app is in foreground. Fix sharing to Session not working. Fix a crash when setting nickname from null. Fix sync messages in open group won t be marked as sent. Fix disappearing message won t work for sync messages. Fix other minor bugs regarding message sending receiving. Improvements: Add log sharing to help with troubleshooting.

Fixes: Fixed an issue where a conversation can only load at most 250 messages. Fixed an issue where some contacts and groups may be failed to be restored. Fixed an issue where disappearing messages may not work for outgoing messages. Fixed untranslated context. Improvements: Now link preview can support more urls. Now conversations of which the latest message is outgoing won t be shown as unread on linked devices. Now Sinhala is available on Session. Now there is a Feedback Survey entrance in Settings screen.

Fixes: Fixed an issue where photo selection may cause a crash. Fixed an issue where the app would sometimes miss closed group messages. Fixed an issue where scanning false QR code to link a device can cause a crash. Fixed an issue where the deleted draft may come back in conversation screen. Improvements: Now conversation screen has more accessibility for voice over mode. Now a symbol will show up when there are unread mentions in a conversation. Now there is an option for copying the link in messages.
Fixes: Fixed an issue where messages would sometimes send twice in closed groups. Fixed an issue where the app would sometimes miss closed group messages.
Fixes: Fixed an issue where downloads could appear stuck. Improvements: The app now defaults to the iOS light or dark mode setting on first install. Improved swipe to reply behavior.

Fixes: Fixed various minor scrolling issues. Fixed an issue where the app would notify you for messages that you sent in a closed group. Fixed an issue where push notifications would still come through for muted threads. Improvements: Voice messages are now capped at 3 minutes. Minor performance improvements. You can now select to only be notified when you re mentioned in group chats. The app now polls more frequently for closed group messages.

Fixes: Fixed an issue where the app would periodically auto resubscribe to push notifications for closed groups that you muted. Fixed various scrolling issues. Fixed an issue where conversations would remain unread. Improvements: Session now warns you if you re about to send your recovery phrase to someone. Performance improvements. The app now better handles situations where your local clock is out of sync with the Service Node network.

Improvements: Profile pictures in group conversations are now tappable. Added a button that takes you to the Session FAQ to the in app settings. More descriptive error messages. Performance improvements.

Fixes: Open group messages would appear as sent even when they failed. This is now fixed. If you mute a closed group it will now also unsubscribe you from push notifications for that closed group. Improvements: Performance improvements. You can now delete all your data from the network when clearing your account. Open group moderation improvements.
Fixes: Fixed a crash that could occur on startup for some users. Improvements: Performance improvements.
Improvements: Messages are now grouped by hour instead of by day. Timestamps are now absolute rather than relative for example: Mon 1:23 PM rather than 12 min ago Various minor security improvements.

Fixes: Fixed a bug where members added to a closed group with an expiration timer set wouldn t see the expiration timer setting. Fixed a bug where the scroll to bottom button could be misplaced. Improvements: Added Croatian Swedish Thai translations. Various other updated translations.

Fixes: Fixed an issue that could cause attachments not to download in rare cases. Various minor closed group related fixes. Improvements: Various updated translations. The app now automatically sticks to the bottom of the conversation screen when a message comes in if you were already at the bottom of the screen . Session will now notify you when a file is saved in a one on one conversation. The app now supports basic deep linking.

Fixes: Mentions didn t always work. This is fixed now. The app now doesn t increment your badge count for muted threads. Fixed an issue where push notifications wouldn t show any content. Fixed various expiration timer issues. Fixed a performance issue that could occur if part of an open group. Improvements: Faster and more reliable file transfer. You can now invite users to an open group by navigating to the open group s conversation settings and tapping the Add Members button. More responsive GIF search. Performance improvements. Minor UI improvements. Background polling is now more reliable. Fixes: Sometimes messages wouldn t show up right away. This is now fixed. Fixed adding users by ONS name. Fixed an issue where usernames sometimes wouldn t appear. Fixed the share extension. Improvements: New and improved open groups! The app now suggests open groups to you and any of the new open groups you join will be faster and more reliable. Laid the foundation for closed groups improvements. We changed the way closed groups work a bit to make them more reliable. Improvements should take effect over the course of the next few weeks. Laid the foundation for faster and more reliable file transfer. The Service Node network now holds on to your messages a bit longer to ensure you don t miss anything if you don t open the app for a few days. General performance improvements. Improved Russian translation contribution by Dmitry Slovak translation contribution by Vlado You can now help translate Session using the button in the in app settings. Minor UI improvements.

Fixes: Sometimes messages wouldn t show up right away. This is now fixed. Fixed adding users by ONS name. Fixed an issue where usernames sometimes wouldn t appear. Improvements: New and improved open groups! The app now suggests open groups to you and any of the new open groups you join will be faster and more reliable. Laid the foundation for closed groups improvements. We changed the way closed groups work a bit to make them more reliable. Improvements should take effect over the course of the next few weeks. Laid the foundation for faster and more reliable file transfer. The Service Node network now holds on to your messages a bit longer to ensure you don t miss anything if you don t open the app for a few days. General performance improvements. Improved Russian translation contribution by Dmitry Slovak translation contribution by Vlado You can now help translate Session using the button in the in app settings. Minor UI improvements.

Fixes: Fixed an issue that could cause bad performance in long conversations. Fixed an issue where message timestamps could be incorrect. The conversation screen now adjusts correctly when you re typing out a URL.
Fixes: Fixed a crash that could occur in very long conversations. Fixed an issue that could cause the unread count to get stuck for a conversation.

Fixes: The select photos option now works correctly when sending a photo the first time. Fixed a crash that could occur in very long conversations. Fixed an issue that could cause some attachments to never download. Improvements: Session now asks you whether you want to trust a contact before downloading content sent by them.

Fixes: Fixed a bug that could cause unnecessary path refreshing. Improvements: The app is now secured against malicious certificate authorities. Improved performance when receiving many messages at once.

Fixes: Fixed various conversation screen scrolling issues. Fixed a bug where messages in group chats could be cut off. Fixed a memory issue that could slow down the app over time. Improvements: Improved Japanese translation. Prepared the app for V2 open groups.
Fixes: Fixed an issue where you could set a nickname for a group. Fixed a scrolling bug in the conversation screen.

Fixes: Fixed various profile updating bugs. Fixed various crashes. Fixed an issue that could prevent the conversation screen from scrolling properly. Made attachments compatible with desktop again. Improvements: The app now has a dedicated link a device flow. You can now add Session users by their ONS name. You can now set nicknames for contacts by going into the conversation settings and editing the name. The app now shows the number of unread messages for a conversation. When opening a conversation Session will now automatically scroll to the first unread message in that conversation. Session will now save a draft if you leave the conversation screen before sending your message. The scroll to bottom button now shows the number of unread messages. Minor UI improvements. Cleanup under the hood.

Fixes: Fixed various profile updating bugs. Fixed a crash that could occur on startup for some users. Fixed an issue that could prevent the conversation screen from scrolling properly. Made attachments compatible with desktop again. Improvements: The app now has a dedicated link a device flow. You can now add Session users by their ONS name. You can now set nicknames for contacts by going into the conversation settings and editing the name. The app now shows the number of unread messages for a conversation. When opening a conversation Session will now automatically scroll to the first unread message in that conversation. Session will now save a draft if you leave the conversation screen before sending your message. The scroll to bottom button now shows the number of unread messages. Minor UI improvements. Cleanup under the hood.

Fixes: Fixed an issue that could prevent the conversation screen from scrolling properly. Made attachments compatible with desktop again. Improvements: You can now set nicknames for contacts by going into the conversation settings and editing the name. The app now shows the number of unread messages for a conversation. When opening a conversation Session will now automatically scroll to the first unread message in that conversation. Session will now save a draft if you leave the conversation screen before sending your message. The scroll to bottom button now shows the number of unread messages. Minor UI improvements. Cleanup under the hood.

Fixes: Fixed an issue that could prevent the conversation screen from scrolling properly. Improvements: You can now set nicknames for contacts by going into the conversation settings and editing the name. The app now shows the number of unread messages for a conversation. When opening a conversation Session will now automatically scroll to the first unread message in that conversation. Minor UI improvements. Cleanup under the hood.

Improvements: Closed groups weren t always reliable. That should be fixed now. Improved performance. The app now supports multi device. To use your account on multiple devices simply restore your account on another device using your recovery phrase.

Fixes: The edit closed group screen should now scroll correctly. Closed group updates are now more descriptive. Fixed an issue where an expiration timer update could show up incorrectly. There was a tapping dead zone around the new conversation button on the home screen. This is now fixed. Improvements: Restoring your account from recovery phrase now works much better. Laid the groundwork for multi device. Performance improvements. Made errors more descriptive. Prepared the app for upcoming closed groups improvements. Various minor UI improvements.
Fixes: Fixed an issue where push notifications would always say You ve got a new message rather than the actual message content. Fixed sharing attachments to Session.

Fixes: There could be a delay between when you received a message and when your conversation list updated. This is now fixed! Rather awkwardly message deletion didn t always work in open groups. We thought you d appreciate it if we fixed that. Improvements: Closed groups now support up to 100 members. Moderators can now permanently ban users from open groups.
Session now uses the Session Protocol! We also made link previews work for almost any site if switched on and fixed various bugs.

Fixes: Minor performance improvements. Improvements: Prepared the app for the upcoming Session Protocol implementation. If you haven t yet upgraded your Session ID the app will now ask you to do so. Improved VoiceOver support.
This version fixes two somewhat common crashes.
Fixes: Fixed a bug that could cause bad performance. Improvements: Re built the message sending receiving pipelines for improved reliability.

Fixes: Attachments should now download automatically after opening the app from a push notification. Improvements: Invite a friend using the in app invite button. : Support for bigger attachments. Voice messages are now limited to one minute.

Fixes: Fixed a file download onion routing issue. Fixed a crash that could happen from time to time. Various share screen fixes. Improvements: New and improved voice messages design. Improved the reliability of closed groups. Improved path maintenance. Tappable profile pictures. Improved GIF searching.

Fixes: Fixed a file download onion routing issue. Fixed a crash that could happen from time to time. Improvements: New and improved voice messages design. Improved the reliability of closed groups. Bigger attachments. Improved path maintenance.

Fixes: Fixed a file download onion routing issue. Fixed a crash that could happen from time to time. Improvements: New and improved voice messages design. Improved the reliability of closed groups. Bigger attachments. Improved path maintenance.

Fixes: Fixed a bug that could cause issues in closed group after a user was removed. Sometimes older messages would collapse after receiving a new one. This is now fixed. Improvements: Increased push notification reliability. Minor UI polish.

Fixes: Fixed a crash that could occur upon opening the message details screen. Improvements: Newly created closed groups will now use the shared sender keys protocol enabling them to be faster more reliable and larger. Editing for newly created closed groups.
Fixes: Fixed a crash that could occur upon sending certain GIFs. The app now follows the notification settings specified in the in app settings. Improvements: Minor UI polish.

Fixes: Fixed a bug that could make open group profile pictures look strange. Improvements: You can now toggle read receipts in the in app settings. Added a copy Session ID button to the conversations settings. Added an all media button to the conversation settings. Profile picture placeholders are now consistent across platforms. Laid the groundwork for improved push notifications and faster bigger and more reliable closed groups.
Fixes: Fixed a bug that could interfere with path re building. Improvements: New and improved profile picture placeholders. Indonesian Vietnamese Japanese Polish translations. UI polish.
Improvements: UI polish. You can now manually reset your session from the conversation settings screen.

Fixes: Replies now correctly show the display name instead of the Session ID. Fixed a bug that could make a conversation get stuck with an unread message. Fixed a bug that could cause open group messages to show up out of order. Improvements: Light mode! The app is now better at handling faulty Service Nodes.

Fixes: Replies now correctly show the display name instead of the Session ID. Fixed a bug that could make a conversation get stuck with an unread message. Fixed a bug that could cause open group messages to show up out of order. Improvements: The app is now better at handling faulty Service Nodes.
Fixes: Messages should now be ordered correctly in open groups. Improvements: Sending photos is now more reliable.

Fixes: Fixed various account restoration related issues. The app should now recover from bad encrypted messages. Session reset now works correctly. Various crash fixes. Fixed open group profile pictures. Fixed an issue where marking a conversation as read wouldn t work. Mentions now show up correctly in notifications. Fixed an issue where profile pictures sometimes wouldn t display. Attachments sometimes wouldn t download after receiving a push notification now they do. Session reset now correctly shows you a confirmation when finished. Fixed an issue where if you tapped a notification while in the settings screen it wouldn t take you to the conversation screen. Cleaned up the message that s shown when you change the disappearing messages timer. Fixed an issue with small photo captions not showing up. Fixed an issue where messages could show up in duplicate in open groups. The muted label now disappears correctly when the mute period expires. When a member of a closed group leaves it now shows their name rather than their ID. Fixed link previews. Improvements: Persian translation. Various minor UI improvements. Closed groups now have a disappearing messages setting. Improved Chinese simplified translation. The app is now better at handling unreliable Service Nodes.

Fixes: The app should now recover from bad encrypted messages. Session reset now works correctly. Various crash fixes. Fixed open group profile pictures. Fixed an issue where marking a conversation as read wouldn t work. Mentions now show up correctly in notifications. Fixed an issue where profile pictures sometimes wouldn t display. Attachments sometimes wouldn t download after receiving a push notification now they do. Session reset now correctly shows you a confirmation when finished. Fixed an issue where if you tapped a notification while in the settings screen it wouldn t take you to the conversation screen. Cleaned up the message that s shown when you change the disappearing messages timer. Fixed an issue with small photo captions not showing up. Fixed an issue where messages could show up in duplicate in open groups. The muted label now disappears correctly when the mute period expires. When a member of a closed group leaves it now shows their name rather than their ID. Fixed link previews. Improvements: Persian translation. Various minor UI improvements. Closed groups now have a disappearing messages setting. Improved Chinese simplified translation. The app is now better at handling unreliable Service Nodes.

Fixes: Various crash fixes. Fixed open group profile pictures. Fixed an issue where marking a conversation as read wouldn t work. Mentions now show up correctly in notifications. Fixed an issue where profile pictures sometimes wouldn t display. Attachments sometimes wouldn t download after receiving a push notification now they do. Session reset now correctly shows you a confirmation when finished. Fixed an issue where if you tapped a notification while in the settings screen it wouldn t take you to the conversation screen. Cleaned up the message that s shown when you change the disappearing messages timer. Fixed an issue with small photo captions not showing up. Fixed an issue where messages could show up in duplicate in open groups. The muted label now disappears correctly when the mute period expires. When a member of a closed group leaves it now shows their name rather than their ID. Fixed link previews. Improvements: Various minor UI improvements. Closed groups now have a disappearing messages setting. Improved Chinese simplified translation. The app is now better at handling unreliable Service Nodes.
Fixes: Fixed open group message deletion. Improvements: Various UI improvements. Any display name is now allowed. Disabled multi device.

Fixes: Fixed a common crash that could occur after tapping a push notification. Fixed an issue that could prevent push notifications from appearing. Improvements: File uploads and open groups are now also fully onion routed. When you tap a push notification to open the app all your messages are now visible right away. Chinese simplified Portuguese Brazil and Italian translations. Simplified the onboarding process for new users. Improved performance. Improved French translation. Various minor UI improvements.
Fixes: Fixed several common crashes. Improvements: Replaced the friend request system by blocking.

Fixes: Fixed link previews for users that have them enabled. Message actions are now consistent across different types of chats. Mentions behavior is now consistent with other platforms. Fixed a session handling bug that could occur in closed groups. Improvements: Prepared the app for the upcoming desktop overhaul. Prepared the app for the upcoming closed groups overhaul.

Fixes: Joining open groups didn t work for some users. It should now be much more reliable. When you unlink a device you want it to be gone. Preferably permanently. Devices now don t come back after you unlink them. Fixed an issue where some of your messages could be missing after leaving and re joining an open group. Fixed open group messaging from a linked device. Open group names and logos now update correctly. When someone messages you in a closed group you will now correctly see their profile picture. Your profile picture should now sync across correctly when linking a device. When your clock is out of sync with the Service Node network that s a problem. The app now tells you when this is the case. Fixed an encryption issue that could prevent some users from sending messages. Unknown contacts now no longer show up when creating a closed group. The app now guards against Service Nodes specifying an unreasonably high proof of work requirement. Some users reported the app crashing when searching in group chats. This has now been fixed. Fixed a crash that could happen after opening a notification. The share screen now shows the correct contacts. Improvements: Overhauled database handling resulting in a more performant and reliable experience. The app now makes better use of multithreading making everything smoother. Photos taken with the in app camera could be rather blurry. The quality should be a lot better now. All mentions are now styled the same. Building the app from source is now considerably easier. Some protocol changes to ensure compatibility with the upcoming desktop refactor. Minor UI improvements.

Fixes: Joining open groups didn t work for some users. It should now be much more reliable. When you unlink a device you want it to be gone. Preferably permanently. Devices now don t come back after you unlink them. Fixed an issue where some of your messages could be missing after leaving and re joining an open group. Fixed open group messaging from a linked device. Open group names and logos now update correctly. When someone messages you in a closed group you will now correctly see their profile picture. Your profile picture should now sync across correctly when linking a device. When your clock is out of sync with the Service Node network that s a problem. The app now tells you when this is the case. Fixed an encryption issue that could prevent some users from sending messages. Unknown contacts now no longer show up when creating a closed group. The app now guards against Service Nodes specifying an unreasonably high proof of work requirement. Some users reported the app crashing when searching in group chats. This has now been fixed. Improvements: Overhauled database handling resulting in a more performant and reliable experience. The app now makes better use of multithreading making everything smoother. Photos taken with the in app camera could be rather blurry. The quality should be a lot better now. All mentions are now styled the same. Building the app from source is now considerably easier. Some protocol changes to ensure compatibility with the upcoming desktop refactor. Minor UI improvements.

Fixes: Open groups show the actual number of members now. Fixed profile pictures in closed groups. The bottom of your conversation list is now always reachable. No more duplicate push notifications. Improvements: The app now uses 3 hop onion requests providing even better anonymity than before. You can now see the Service Nodes used by your app for onion requests and what countries they re in . Made the Session ID in conversation settings copyable. The app now uses more secure seed nodes. Performance improvements. Improved copy across the board.
Fixes: When you link a device your contacts now correctly show up on your other device. Improvements: Significant performance improvements.

Fixes: Fixed multi device friend request acceptance Fixed multi device auto generated friend request bug Fixed contact syncing Fixed APNs token uploading issue Fixed various database handling bugs Fixed various minor UI issues Fixed various crashes Fixed multi device display name updating bug Fixed multi device message status bar updating bug Fixed session reset Fixed various closed groups issues Improvements: Don t attach the sender s profile picture URL to friend request messages to prevent unsolicited content from being sent Major refactoring of the Session protocol layer Made default RSS feeds deletable Don t auto join default RSS feeds Increased message TTL Added tests for Session protocol corner cases Made device linking more reliable Improved performance

Fixes: Sometimes Service Nodes aren t reliable. Session now correctly retries with a different Service Node if a message failed to send. Fixed various multithreading bugs that could cause poor performance or undefined behavior. Fixed various closed group bugs. Improvements: Session now offers the choice between using APNs and background polling previously the default for push notifications. APNs provides much more reliable and immediate push notifications. Heavily refactored the service node communication layer for greatly improved reliability. Various minor UI improvements.

Fixes: Updated for service node changes making attachments over 1 MB work again. Moved away from long polling in accordance with service node changes. Improvements: Made device linking instructions clearer. Fixed various text clipping issues. Editing photos now doesn t make the modal glitch anymore.
Fixes: Fixed various crashes. The privacy policy URL now points to the new web page. Improvements: Minor UI polish. Increased font sizes.

Fixes: Fixed a bug where the input bar would occasionally disappear after sending an attachment. Fixed various multi device syncing issues. A crash that could occur on older devices is now fixed. Fixed a bug where device unlinking would occasionally not work. UI issues due to landscape mode don t occur anymore. Improvements: Various home screen UI improvements. Various conversation screen UI improvements. Refactoring. Pre key bundles are now validated before they re used. Device linking is now faster.

Fixes: Fixed a bug where the input bar would disappear after creating a closed group. Fixed various issues causing push notifications not to appear. Fixed a bug causing session reset not to work in some cases. Improvements: Fixed various threading issues to improve performance. Refactoring. Profile pictures are now no longer tied to an auth token.
This update fixes a freeze that could occur on joining an open group and generally improves performance.
